description: meta info used by the CP2K parser, all names are expected to start with cp2k_

metaInfos.description: The DBCSR (Distributed Block Compressed Sparse Row) information.
metaInfos.name: cp2k_section_dbcsr

metaInfos.description: Contains information about the starting conditions for this run.
metaInfos.name: cp2k_section_startinformation

metaInfos.description: The time when this run was started.
metaInfos.name: cp2k_run_start_time

metaInfos.description: The date when this run was started.
metaInfos.name: cp2k_run_start_date

metaInfos.description: Contains information about the software version used for this run.
metaInfos.name: cp2k_section_programinformation

metaInfos.description: The SVN revision number.

metaInfos.description: The total number of different entities in the calculation.
metaInfos.name: cp2k_section_total_numbers

metaInfos.description: The number of shell sets in the calculation.
metaInfos.name: cp2k_shell_sets

metaInfos.description: Section grouping together the quantities calculated during an MD.
metaInfos.name: cp2k_section_md

metaInfos.description: Section grouping together the quantities calculated during an MD step.
metaInfos.name: cp2k_section_md_step

metaInfos.description: The number of a molecular dynamics step.
metaInfos.name: cp2k_md_step_number

metaInfos.description: The instantaneous temperature during MD step.

metaInfos.description: The average temperature during MD step.
metaInfos.name: cp2k_md_temperature_average

metaInfos.description: The simulation time of a molecular dynamics step.
metaInfos.name: cp2k_md_step_time

metaInfos.description: Section for atomic forces during an MD step.
metaInfos.name: cp2k_section_md_forces

metaInfos.description: Section for atomic forces during an MD step.
metaInfos.name: cp2k_section_md_force_atom

metaInfos.description: The force components of an individual atom during an MD step.

metaInfos.description: The force components of an individual atom during an MD step.
metaInfos.name: cp2k_md_force_atom_float

metaInfos.description: The atomic forces during an MD step.
metaInfos.name: cp2k_md_forces

metaInfos.description: Section for atomic coordinates during an MD step.
metaInfos.name: cp2k_section_md_coordinates

metaInfos.name: cp2k_section_md_coordinate_atom

metaInfos.description: The coordinate components of an individual atom  as a string during an MD step.
